channel.title: Personal on S-cubed
channel.description: Recent content in Personal on S-cubed

item.title: TWIL: 7 lessons from 6 months as a full-time freelancer
item.description: TL;DR: This week, I have been reflecting on my first 6 months as a full-time freelancer and the huge amount I have learned in that time. I have condensed these thoughts into 7 lessons I have learned as a new freelancer and ex-digital nomad. Background At the end of February, I returned to the UK after travelling full-time for 18 months1 and travelling part-time for many more years (besides an obvious pandemic-imposed break!
